description: Episode of Series "Totally Gross Anatomy". This program investigates how food is taken into the body and then transformed into energy by exploring the Digestive System, with the main focus on the stomach. The other parts of the system described are the mouth, oesophagus, and the small and large intestines. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teachers guide included.
